name: Life Fix 3D
description:
Can you rescue the popular young lady from the pinch of a desperate life?
The Damsel Queen needs your help! Try to help her out of challenging situations, It all depends on you.
Just think out of the box! Use your brain, do tricks and save her life by solving puzzles. Make the right choices and let her escape from the dire situations.

Accomplish your design ideas & make her distressed with a complete makeover. Let's renovate and decorate her messy rooms in the mansion. Renovate it as you own it!

Dig into the easy and fun adventure puzzle game.


HOW TO PLAY:
It's simple!
- Choose the correct answer to complete your challenge and go to the next level!
- Get it wrong, and it's game over for you!

FEATURES:
- Simple gameplay and tricky puzzles
- Beautiful graphics
- Intuitive controls
- Best addicted brain teaser tests
